import React from'react';import'./TopicSidebar.css';// Define the topics with subtopics
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const topics={global:{name:'Global News',subtopics:['Politics','Technology','Economy','Health','Environment']},local:{name:'Local News',subtopics:['Uttar Pradesh','Maharashtra','Delhi','Karnataka','Tamil Nadu']}};const TopicSidebar=_ref=>{let{onTopicSelect,selectedTopic}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"topic-sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Topics"}),Object.entries(topics).map(_ref2=>{let[key,topic]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"topic-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:topic.name}),topic.subtopics.map(subtopic=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`topic-header ${selectedTopic===subtopic?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>onTopicSelect(subtopic),children:subtopic},subtopic))]},key);})]});};export default TopicSidebar;
